tool_description: Calculates preliminary loss estimates based on incident details, damage descriptions, and historical claim data patterns.

incident_type.description: Type of incident (auto accident, property damage, liability, etc.)

property_type.description: Type of property damaged (vehicle, home, commercial building, etc.)

injury_severity.description: Severity of any injuries (none, minor, moderate, severe)

geographic_location.description: Geographic area for cost adjustment factors

error_messages: Unsupported incident type: Use standard incident types for accurate estimation.
Insufficient damage description: Provide detailed damage information for reliable estimation.
Invalid injury severity: Use 'none', 'minor', 'moderate', or 'severe' for injury_severity.
Estimation model unavailable: Unable to generate estimate for this combination of factors.
usage: Provide incident_type and damage_description for basic estimation. Include property_type, injury_severity, and geographic_location for more accurate preliminary loss estimates.

property_damage_estimate.description: Estimated cost for property damage repairs

medical_expense_estimate.description: Estimated medical expenses if injuries are involved

total_loss_estimate.description: Combined estimate of total potential loss

estimation_confidence.description: Confidence level of the estimate (low, medium, high)

cost_categories.description: Breakdown of cost categories included in estimate
